name: Crystal Caverns (itch) (Jamie Buttenshaw)
description:
Crystal Caverns is a side-scrolling platforming game, where you must travel as deep into the cave as you dare to collect crystals. But beware, the caves are full of deadly wolves guarding the crystals. If you do not return to the surface with the crystals you collected, then you will score nothing. 

The wolves are awoken when you mines crystals nearby, and they act aggressively toward you. They will chase you, and if you let them get close enough, they will bite you.

Controls:

  • Use A/D to walk left and right.
  •  Use W to jump or climb ladders.
  •  Use S to slide down ladders or drop through thin platforms.
  • Use the Space bar to mine crystals for points.
  • Use the Left Control key to crawl along the ground.
  • Use Escape key to pause the game.

Created as part of my Games Programming module at Abertay University, through January 2021 - May 2021. Built with C++ and SFML.
